仲讀civil 今年大把3大civil 搵唔到工

Temporary Works, Structures and Tall Buildings, Geotechnical Engineering Practice 依3科比較實用,出到黎做野會比較常用

Advanced Maths我就唔太清楚,不過我聽人講過thei個邊如果你無讀過advanced maths, 佢會要你補take番個course

利申:揀左ENG4200 Advanced Engineering Mathematics同埋CON4317 Temporary Works 等緊畢業

high dip 仔讀咁多advance maths 冇乜用
d 數咁深, 係design office engineer 先要做,
high dip 仔出到黎咪做d 下欄嘢
temp works, geotechnical engineering practice 口水嘢, 簡單計算力學對high dip 仔已經夠, 除非你好想讀degree, master, 入design office la.

想刷成績=tall build + maths
想學野=temp work + geo

Temp work + math

呢兩科派A 冇乜邊個會低過個grade
搭單一問，Ive mech揀咩科好？
